overview: Envoy Yulia flies to the planet and meets Rex, who said that at first everything went well, and then, as a result of the absorption of local silicon organisms, mutations caused by silicon viruses began. As a result, Harper received a lethal dose of radiation. Rex separated his head, connected it to an autonomous life support system, and created several Harper clones so that earth scientists would attach Harper's head to the body of one of them. Harper said that the project's name has a second meaning: The end of technological civilization.
tagline: A dog cloning experiment run amok! Tentacle scientists and silicone based life abound!
title: AMBA
